# uptime_dashboards (Data Source)

Retrieve a list of all dashboards configured in your Uptime.com account. Dashboards provide customizable views of your monitoring data.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Retrieve all dashboards configured in your Uptime.com account
data "uptime_dashboards" "all" {}

# Filter for a specific dashboard by name
locals {
  main_dashboard = [
    for dashboard in data.uptime_dashboards.all.dashboards :
    dashboard if dashboard.name == "Production Overview"
  ][0]
}

# Filter for pinned dashboards
locals {
  pinned_dashboards = [
    for dashboard in data.uptime_dashboards.all.dashboards :
    dashboard if dashboard.is_pinned
  ]
}

# Output dashboard information
output "main_dashboard_id" {
  value       = local.main_dashboard.id
  description = "ID of the main production dashboard"
}

output "pinned_dashboard_names" {
  value       = [for d in local.pinned_dashboards : d.name]
  description = "Names of all pinned dashboards"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `dashboards` (Attributes List) List of all dashboards in the account (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--dashboards))
- `id` (String) Placeholder identifier for the data source

<a id="nestedatt--dashboards"></a>
### Nested Schema for `dashboards`

Read-Only:

- `alerts_for_all_checks` (Boolean) Whether to show alerts for all checks
- `alerts_show_section` (Boolean) Whether to show alerts section
- `id` (Number) Unique identifier for the dashboard
- `is_pinned` (Boolean) Whether the dashboard is pinned
- `metrics_for_all_checks` (Boolean) Whether to show metrics for all checks
- `metrics_show_section` (Boolean) Whether to show metrics section
- `name` (String) Name of the dashboard
- `ordering` (Number) Display order of the dashboard
- `services_include_down` (Boolean) Whether to include DOWN services
- `services_include_maintenance` (Boolean) Whether to include services in MAINTENANCE
- `services_include_paused` (Boolean) Whether to include PAUSED services
- `services_include_up` (Boolean) Whether to include UP services
- `services_num_to_show` (Number) Number of services to display
- `services_primary_sort` (String) Primary sort field for services
- `services_secondary_sort` (String) Secondary sort field for services
- `services_selected` (List of String) List of selected service URLs
- `services_show_response_time` (Boolean) Whether to show response time for services
- `services_show_section` (Boolean) Whether to show services section
- `services_show_uptime` (Boolean) Whether to show uptime for services
- `services_tags` (List of String) List of service tags to filter by
